original_text: The fourth, for the fourth month, was Asahel the brother of Joab; his son Zebadiah was his successor. There were 24,000 men in his division.
korean_text: 넷째 달 넷째 지휘관은 요압의 아우 아사헬이요 그 다음은 그의 아들 스바댜이니 그의 반에 이만 사천 명이요

sentences.original_text: The fourth, for the fourth month,
sentences.korean_translation: 네 번째는, 네 번째 달을 위한 것인데,

sentences.original_text: was Asahel the brother of Joab;
his son Zebadiah was his successor.
